title: Astronauts and jellybeans
creator_credit: Dan Bessie, Severo Perez and Learning Garden
brief_description: Animation and live action are used to outline the development of the spoken and written language, beginning with the earliest diagrammatic and pictorial forms of communication. Notes the importance of the written word, the use of the dictionary, and the sound of words.
